aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.about: I’m Arturo Larios, currently I’m a web developer being mainly a Full Stack Developer. I’m a person dedicated, responsible, I know how to work in a team, fast learner, I like what I do and always I try to do my best; I like challenges and learn every day. When I’m offline I love play videogames, watch series and spend time with my family.
